DOC.brief_summary: An optimal angiographic view angle critical correct diagnosis intervention coronary bifurcation lesion percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) . The current study aim validate dedicate software tool ( MEDIS , Leiden , The Netherlands ) improve selection best view angle .
DOC.brief_title: BOVAS : Bifurcation Optimal Viewing Angle Selection Study
DOC.criteria: Patient old 18 year age Informed consent available Hemodynamic unstability ( cardiogenic shock , lifethreatening arrhythmia , inotropic support ) Impaired renal function ( serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl )
